import "../layout.css"; import { RiHomeLine } from "react-icons/ri"; import { FiShoppingCart } from "react-icons/fi"; import { FaRegHeart } from "react-icons/fa"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { AiOutlineDropbox } from "react-icons/ai"; import { BiLogIn, BiLogOut } from "react-icons/bi"; import { useAuthDispatch, useAuthState } from "../../auth/auth-context"; export const Sidebar = ({ sidebar }) => { const user = useAuthState(); const dispatch = useAuthDispatch(); return ( <>
Home Products Cart Wishlist
{user?.token === "" ? ( Login ) : ( logout(dispatch)} to="/" className="nav-link" activeClassName="nav-active" > Logout )} {/* TO ADD LATER Profile */}
); };
